<h2> Website Overview </h2> 
<br>
This project aims to map and exploreH1-B Visa Application Characteristics in America</br><br>
<i><b>Overview</b></i>:Project proposal including motivation, methods, research questions and findings</br><br>
<i><b>Shiny</b></i>: Graph illustration of top 10 cities in each state that hire H-1B workers, as well as workers' wage range.</br><br>
<i><b>Dashboard</b></i>: US map with showing amount of cases and wage range in each state; US map with showing average wage for each industry, with top 15 companies listed</br><br>


<h2> Background information</h2> 
<br>
Here are some extra links related to H-1B if you are interested.

[Everything you need to know](https://www.upcounsel.com/h1b-visa-status):from what is H-1B, how much it cost, who qualified to pros and cons.

[Key-facts](https://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2017/04/27/key-facts-about-the-u-s-h-1b-visa-program/) of H-1B visa: more statistics!

[Employer data hub](https://www.uscis.gov/h-1b-data-hub):includes data from fiscal year 2009 through the third quarter of fiscal year 2019 on employers who have submitted petitions to employ H-1B nonimmigrant workers.
